title: F1 Debut
description: Made his Formula 1 debut with McLaren, becoming the first black driver in F1 history. Finished on the podium in his first race.

title: First World Championship
description: Won his first World Championship in dramatic fashion at the Brazilian Grand Prix, becoming the youngest champion at the time.

title: Joined Mercedes
description: Made the bold move to Mercedes-AMG Petronas, a decision that would define the next era of his career.

title: Second World Championship
description: Dominated the season with 11 wins, securing his second World Championship with Mercedes.

title: Third World Championship
description: Successfully defended his title with 10 race victories throughout the season.

title: Fourth World Championship
description: Won his fourth title after an intense battle, matching Alain Prost and Sebastian Vettel.

title: Fifth World Championship
description: Secured his fifth championship, joining the elite club with Juan Manuel Fangio.

title: Sixth World Championship
description: Won his sixth title, moving within one of Michael Schumacher's record.

title: Seventh World Championship
description: Equaled Michael Schumacher's record of 7 World Championships with a dominant season.

title: 100th Race Win
description: Became the first driver in F1 history to reach 100 Grand Prix victories.

title: Continued Legacy
description: Continues to inspire millions and advocate for diversity and sustainability in motorsport.
